Looks like a great time to buy. Didn't realize the dividend is so strong.

if you use BBY as an indicator/forecast for the overall market - Looks like the market is headed for some down days in the near future - As I said earlier, BBY can be a leading indicator for the market. Time will tell.
Own a small amount of BBY. Don't agree with getting into the medical field however. Better off growing the core business imho. Any other opinions?

I still think the stock is extremely undervalued. Yes, there are supply chain issues everywhere, but Best Buy has managed their supply chain through Covid better than any other retailer out there. Also, they were one of the first retailers to lift worker wages and so their previous quarter numbers already reflected that increased cost of business. ￼Definitely needs a catalyst, I hope it comes soon and we don’t have to wait for next earnings.

BBY almost always falls a few days after earnings - Need to wait until it finds its footing. Another thing I noticed about the price action of BBY - If the stock (BBY) falls (for a sustained trend) the overall market soon after falls - Appears to be a leader on overall market trend....not always but quite a few times in the last 5 years.
Today, Piper Sandlin calls Best Buy a best idea stock pick with an assigned price target of $150.
